title: AI行业结构性变化：军事合作、基础设施投资和开源生态发展
core_insight: 今日AI行业结构性变化的核心在于军事合作、基础设施投资和开源生态的发展，这些变化将对AI的应用和发展产生深远影响

dimension_texts.technology: LLM和RAG的应用和发展 sequential attention和smart sampling Sequential Attention: Making AI models leaner and faster without sacrificing accuracy Introducing GIST: The next stage in smart sampling
dimension_texts.infrastructure: 基础设施投资的增加 数据中心和云计算的发展 The billion-dollar infrastructure deals powering the AI boom
dimension_texts.application: 军事和国防行业 传统解决方案的替代 Our agreement with the Department of War Statement on the comments from Secretary of War Pete Hegseth
dimension_texts.capital: 基础设施投资的增加 公司估值的上涨 公司的战略合作和收购 The billion-dollar infrastructure deals powering the AI boom Anthropic’s Claude rises to No. 2 in the App Store following Pentagon dispute
dimension_texts.risk: 监管和立法的变化 伦理和安全问题的关注 供应链和地缘风险的增加 Our agreement with the Department of War Statement on the comments from Secretary of War Pete Hegseth
